metadata.name: Find A Flower In The Dark #1/30
metadata.description:
Amber Vittoria’s abstracted work draws on her relationship to femininity, emotion, and identity. This ongoing collection comprises several physical works from Amber’s personal archive, listed as NFT editions ranging in pricing and edition size. This edition is of 30.

“Find A Flower In The Dark”
Cherish the night,
As you relish the day,
For dreaming in our sleep,
Rarely leads us astray.

The artwork listed above is indeed authentic, created by, and copyright to artist Amber Vittoria; the purchase of this NFT is a purchase of the asset, not of the copyright.
